summary: This is a remodel of Vlindrel Hall that I made.
descriptionHtml: This is a mod that I have been working on for awhile as I prefer Vlindrel Hall the way I remade it with a small armory and putting the alchemy and enchantment areas in one spot.  I also added a Anvil, Tannery, Workbench, Wood Chopping Block, & Smelter.  This house has everything you need.  It will work with or without Dawnguard and Hearthfire.  Enjoy!!!
author: aksparky
